background_description: The background consists of a dense layer of dried and decaying leaves, some twigs, and patches of earth. The colors are predominantly various shades of brown, grey, and dark ochre, with irregular textures and highlights from natural light filtering through.
camouflage_type: Color blending / Pattern matching / Shadow hiding
explanation: The toad exhibits excellent camouflage in this image. Its mottled brown, grey, and earthy coloration perfectly matches the dry, decaying leaves and soil particles that make up its environment. The rough, textured skin of the toad also mimics the irregular surfaces and granular appearance of the leaf litter and dirt, making it difficult to distinguish. Furthermore, the toad is nestled among the leaves, utilizing the natural shadows and irregular shapes of the environment to break up its outline and further blend in. The overall contrast difference between the toad and its surroundings is very low, requiring close inspection to locate the animal.
